titles.title: There is a place of quiet rest

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Jesus, blest Redeemer, Sent from the heart of God, Hold us, who wait before Thee, Near to the heart of God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There is a place of quiet rest, Near to the heart of God, A place where sin cannot molest, Near to the heart of God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There is a place of comfort sweet, Near to the heart of God, A place where we our Savior meet, Near to the heart of God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There is a place of full release, Near to the heart of God, A place where all is joy and peace, Near to the heart of God.{/lang-eng}
